summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1295, for the improvement of Northlake Avenue, from the west margin of 2nd Avenue Northeast to 10th Avenue Northeast; 10th Avenue Northeast from Northlake Avenue to Brintnall Place; and Latona Avenue, from Northlake Avenue to Pacific Place, all in the City of Seattle by constructing a plank roadway thereon, 16 feet in width under Ordinance No. 14145, and levying and assessing the amounts therefor against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown on said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
